TopicTitle: Is it possible to switch the VAB camera to the SPH camera functionality?

Articles.Content: I'm thinking more of the lateral movement capability. I once had a glitch where the SPH camera suddenly decided that it was the VAB camera, but I have no idea how that happened and zero idea how to reproduce.
Have a look at my mod EditorCamExtension. I think it does what you are asking here for.
Thanks, that's definetly what I'm looking for.
And ... should be stock. I build my complex, huge rockets in SPH nowadays because of this limitation.
The EditorCamExtensions wasn't actually what I was looking for. I meant something that gives all of the SPH camera functionality to the VAB one.
